I’m a Quantitative Analyst at [Societe Generale](https://www.societegenerale.com) in Paris, working on climate risk modeling within the RISQ/MDL/MOD team. 
I graduated with a Financial Engineering degree from [ENSIMAG](https://ensimag.grenoble-inp.fr/fr/formation/ingenieur-de-grenoble-inp-ensimag-filiere-ingenierie-pour-la-finance#page-presentation) and a Msc in Quantitative Finance from [IAE Grenoble](https://iae.grenoble-inp.fr/fr/nos-formations/master-2-finance-quantitative#page-presentation), specializing in stochastic calculus, advanced quantitative techniques and statistical analysis.

Outside of work, I enjoy exploring new technologies and problem-solving. I’m also passionate about sharing knowledge and contributing to the finance and tech communities.

**Interests:** Algorithmic Trading, Quantitative Finance, Climate Risk Modeling and Continuous Learning


## Inquiries
If you have questions about my work or are interested in collaborating, feel free to [contact me](mailto:isselmouo4@gmail.com). I am always interested in discussing workshop offerings and collaborative opportunities.
